GT's Living Foods is the Kombucha industry's most recognized name.

For over two decades, the company has been hand crafting Kombucha the way nature intended. While preserving the essence of the grassroots brand, we designed and developed a new experience incorporating tranquil beauty and delightful moments that nourish the mind, body, and soul.

Flavor innovator

Whether you're in the mood for something spicy or hearty, GT's has a flavor for everyone. With descriptive menus and visual filters, we helped users find the flavor that perfectly speaks to their inner soul.

A browsable showcase

Since its invention, Kombucha has been regarded as a sacred elixir. In creating this showcase, we wanted to give full respect to the vibrant beauty of the product and give a nod to its eastern roots. GT's striking flavors are the central focus in this easily browsable showcase.
